content.p: Apply for your first university card You need: The photo needs to be approximately 420x420 pixels in jpeg format and must comply with the following requirements: If your photo does not comply with the above or is otherwise inappropriate you will be liable to pay a Â£15 replacement fee. Upload photo Details for uploading your photo: Tenant: UON Username: Payroll number/Student ID number Password: Staff - Unique password sent to you via email Students - Date of birth (DDMMYYYY) Card Collection The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
